Malaysia: After 61 years in power, Barisan Nasional is defeated by Pakatan Harapan in the Malaysian general election, 2018. [1]
Israel: United States recognition of Jerusalem as the capital of Israel:President Donald Trump formally announces United States recognition of Jerusalem as the capital of Israel.
Germany: Angela Merkel was elected to her fourth term as chancellor (364/688 votes in the Bundestag), forming the Fourth Merkel cabinet. Olaf Scholz (SPD) became Vice Chancellor.
2018 Münster attack: 3 civilians and the perpetrator were killed.
